    Reference

    VegX documents

    Creates/reads/writes a VegX object or merges objects

    summary(<VegX>)

    S4 class for Veg-X documents

    newVegX()

    New VegX document

    mergeVegX()

    Merge Veg-X documents

    readVegXML()

    Reads a Veg-X XML file

    writeVegXML()

    Write VegX XML file

    Main VegX elements

    Adds/replaces/shows element information a VegX object

    addAggregateOrganismObservations()

    Add aggregate organism observation records

    addCommunityObservations()

    Add community observation records

    addIndividualOrganismObservations()

    Add individual organism observation records

    addPlotGeometries()

    Adds/replaces plot geometry information

    addPlotLocations()

    Adds/replaces plot location information

    addPlotObservations()

    Add plot observation records

    addSiteCharacteristics()

    Adds/replaces site information

    addSiteObservations()

    Add site observation records

    addStratumObservations()

    Add stratum observation records

    addSurfaceCoverObservations()

    Add surface cover observation records

    addTaxonBySiteData()

    Add a taxon by site table

    showElementTable()

    Coerces VegX elements into a data frame

    Fill resource elements

    Fill resource data (project, parties, unique identifiers) in a VegX object

    fillPartyInformation()

    Fills the information for a given party

    fillProjectInformation()

    Fills the information for a given research project

    fillUniqueIdentifiers()

    Generates unique identifiers

    Vegetation strata

    Defines vegetation strata

    VegXStrataDefinition-class

    S4 class for Veg-X strata definition

    defineMixedStrata()

    Mixed stratum definiton

    defineHeightStrata()

    Stratum definition by height

    defineCategoricalStrata()

    Strata definition by simple category

    Surface types

    Defines surface types

    VegXSurfaceTypeDefinition-class

    S4 class for Veg-X surface type definition

    defineSurfaceTypes()

    Surface type definition

    Measurements

    Defines measurement scales and applies transformations

    VegXMethodDefinition-class

    S4 class for a Veg-X measurement method definition

    defineOrdinalScaleMethod()

    Ordinal scale method definition

    defineQualitativeScaleMethod()

    Qualitative scale method definition

    defineQuantitativeScaleMethod()

    Quantitative scale method definition

    predefinedMeasurementMethod()

    Predefined measurement methods

    transformOrdinalScale()

    Transform ordinal scale

    transformQuantitativeScale()

    Transform quantitative scale

    quantitative_methods

    List of predefined quantitative methods

    Taxon nomenclature

    Initial or preferred taxon nomenclature

    setPreferredTaxonNomenclature()

    Sets preferred taxon nomenclature

    setOriginalIdentificationConcepts()

    Sets original identification taxon concepts

    Example data

    Example data sets

    mokihinui moki_loc moki_site moki_tcv moki_dia moki_lookup moki_str

    Mokihinui example dataset for Veg-X

    mtfyffe mtfyffe_loc mtfyffe_site mtfyffe_counts mtfyffe_dia mtfyffe_disturbance mtfyffe_groundcover mtfyffe_lookup

    Mt Fyffe example dataset for Veg-X

    takitimu taki_loc taki_site taki_freq taki_disturbance taki_groundcover taki_lookup

    Takitimu example dataset for Veg-X
